author: johns4
content: Here are a few screenshots from a client-neutral UI that I am working on. I'm looking for feedback on this. I'm thinking a UI could be a helpful devtool for testnets/client data, so I'd like to know what data is most important for you client devs & merge testnet-ers. All data is coming from JSON RPC apis. If y'all don't think something like this is needed, I may focus the UI as a tool for home node operators. My #1 personal goal is to help in any way with the merge & testing.
